concept.title: File Wait Time and Empty Batches
concept.shortdesc: When the Directory origin completes processing for existing files, it can send empty batches to pipeline destinations at regular intervals until new files appear. Use the File Wait Time general property to define the number of seconds to wait for new files before sending an empty batch.

conbody.p: Send empty batches when you want to write to destination systems regularly. For example, you might send empty batches to keep connections to destination systems from timing out or to trigger additional workflows in destinations systems.
